sourcesContent:
const Month = (props) => {

    const number = props.number;
    const abr = props.abr;

    const monthReference = {
        1: "January",
        2: "February",
        3: "March",
        4: "April",
        5: "May",
        6: "June",
        7: "July",
        8: "August",
        9: "September",
        10: "October",
        11: "November",
        12: "December"
    }
    const monthAbrReference = {
        1: "Jan",
        2: "Feb",
        3: "Mar",
        4: "Apr",
        5: "May",
        6: "Jun",
        7: "Jul",
        8: "Aug",
        9: "Sep",
        10: "Oct",
        11: "Nov",
        12: "Dec"
    }
    const month = abr ? monthAbrReference[number] : monthReference[number];

    return month
}

export default Month
